t: Amazon.com: Talk O Texas Okra Pickled Mild (Pack of 2) : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: This is a late review, but I've ordered both the spicy and mild varieties of this brand, they are delicious. I've had no problem with broken jars, etc. but given how AZ packs things, wouldn't be surprised if others did. Aside from packing, these have a nice crunch, great flavor, love them.

t: Talk O' Texas Brands, Inc. - San Angelo, TX - Home
s: Known for our delicious mild or hot Crisp Okra Pickles, Talk O' Texas Brands, Inc. has combined satisfying flavor with unmatched dedication to quality since 1950. From day one we’ve been a family business, and we’ve proudly continued this tradition for over 65 years!

t: Amazon.com : Talk O Texas Okra Mild Pickles, 16 oz (Pack of 3) : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: This is the best brand by far. I have tried both the regular and hot. Both are pretty mild. ... My family loves okra and the pickled okra use to be in our grocery store, but I haven't been able to find it for awhile, so I was excited to find Talk of Texas pickled okra on Amazon

t: Talk O' Texas Brands, Inc. - San Angelo, TX - History
s: In 1950, Talk O' Texas Brands, Inc. was originated in the family kitchen of Dick and Mitzi Grimes in San Angelo, Texas. Our company's first major contract was signed with Neiman Marcus in Dallas. In 1955, Al Ricci purchased a large minority interest in the fledgling business, and completed ...
